column1: The Pit Room////The staff & service was AMAZING . The food was very good . Not exactly what I would call "the best BBQ in Houston " but it was good & quality. The chicken was tough
column2: which was disappointing & the BBQ sauce is very interesting
column3: kind of a sweet / spicy molasses tang to it
column4: It definitely does not have a Texas feel . Not to my & my husbands liking Â but then again
